item.title: EP 98 - Paranormal Pornstars
item.itunes:title: Paranormal Pornstars
item.description:
It's ghost-a-mania today on Dead Rabbit Radio!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

First we look at the creepy story of a terrible plane crash. Were components from that doomed flight installed in other planes? And are the reports true that ghosts of the flight crew appeared on those other planes to protect them?

Then we visit England to meet a young psychic who said she has already had over a dozen ghost lovers. Now, she's ready to tie the knot and have a ghost baby!

And finally, we visit a porn set . . .a HAUNTED porn set! Can this intrepid team of pornstars turned ghost hunters finally provide us with proof of the supernatural?

Links:

Eastern Air Lines Flight 401

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eastern_Air_Lines_Flight_401

Ghosts of Flight 401

https://www.near-death.com/paranormal/ghosts.html

Grounding the Ghost of Flight 401

https://skeptoid.com/episodes/4563

Woman who has had sex with 15 ghosts is settling down with a poltergeist

https://www.cornwalllive.com/news/cornwall-news/woman-who-sex-15-ghosts-2161821

Woman who has sex with ghosts now says she's engaged to one

https://www.bristolpost.co.uk/news/bristol-news/bristol-woman-says-ghost-boyfriend-2158604?fbclid=IwAR2lddkpTFKrfG9cGoYT-6pBG3paWVLOK84Xr3hUlYUijb3_DMC05sOXxDY

BRIDE AND GHOUL Psychic makes spooktacular claim that her soulmate ghost PROPOSED to her ‘in caves’ and says sex with phantoms is ‘more satisfying’

https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/7604807/psychic-soulmate-ghost-proposal-halloween/

Pornstars turn ghost hunters after something goes bump in the night

https://www.plymouthherald.co.uk/news/plymouth-news/pornstars-turn-ghost-hunters-after-2159862

Pornstars set up paranormal investigation team after things get really creepy during raunchy shoot

https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/pornstars-set-up-paranormal-investigation-13479416

Porn Stars Embark On Paranormal Investigation

https://alt929boston.com/2018/10/30/porn-stars-embark-on-paranormal-investigation/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Ending Music: "Melancholia" Music Box By Ryan Creep

https://soundcloud.com/adrian-croitor-1

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
